com.gmail.davideblade99.healthbar.manager

Class EntityTrackerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.davideblade99.healthbar.manager.EntityTrackerManager

  • public final class EntityTrackerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for tracking entities with a health bar

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.List<org.bukkit.entity.EntityType> DISABLED_ENTITIES
      Entity whose name will never be changed (and therefore will not have a health bar)
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> mobTable
      Map the entity (ID) with the task (ID) that hides its health bar once the delay has passed
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,CustomNameSetting> namesTable
      Map the entity (ID) with its original custom name (before the health bar is applied)
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> playerTable
      Map the name of the player with the task (ID) that hides its health bar once the delay has passed
      private HealthBar plugin

    • Method Detail

      • registerMobHit

        public void registerMobHit(@NotNull
                           @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity attacked,
                           boolean damagedByEntity)
        Method that deals with performing all necessary actions at the time an entity is hit. Specifically, if the entity is among those that should have a health bar and if it is in a world where the plugin is not disabled, the method shows or updates the health bar and hides the bar after the delay (if set)
        Parameters:
        attacked - Entity hit
        damagedByEntity - Whether the entity has been hit by another entity

      • registerPlayerHit

        public void registerPlayerHit(@NotNull
                              @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                              boolean damagedByEntity)

      • hideMobBar

        public void hideMobBar(@NotNull
                       @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity mob)
        Hides the health bar and restores the custom name, if there was one
        Parameters:
        mob - Mob whose bar is to be hidden

      • removeAllMobHealthBars

        public void removeAllMobHealthBars()
        Remove health bars from all mobs

      • getNameWhileHavingBar

        @Nullable
public @Nullable java.lang.String getNameWhileHavingBar(@NotNull
                                                                   @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity mob)
        Gets the real name of the mob, even if it doesn't have the health bar
        Parameters:
        mob - Mob whose name is being searched
        Returns:

      • getName

        @NotNull
private @NotNull java.lang.String getName(@NotNull
                                                    @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity mob)
        Gets the custom name of the mob. If it is not set it fetches the translated name in the local.yml file.
        Parameters:
        mob - Entity of which get the custom name
        Returns:
        The name to be placed in the health bar

      • isNamed

        private boolean isNamed(@NotNull
                        @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity entity)
        Checks if the entity already has a custom name (set by another plugin or with a name tag)
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to check
        Returns:
        True if the entity has a custom name (not set by HealthBar), otherwise false
